text_snippet.content: We reserve the right to suspend or end the services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice.
We provide these services on an "as is" and "as available" basis

If you wish to access or export any of your personal data, then please contact us.
Your data will be sent to the email provided within 24 hours.
We do not use cookies for tracking purposes.

Sharing data like address book contacts, anonymous usage statistics, and crash logs is completely optional on your part.
You can opt-out anytime

The user is obliged


(a) to provide only true and non-misleading statements along with its real name, and to refrain from using pseudonyms or pen names,
The user is obliged   (a) to provide only true and non-misleading statements along with its real name, and to refrain from using pseudonyms or pen names,

Access
By accessing the Website, you certify that:

you are at least 18 years of age or the age of majority under the laws of your state, province or country.
and
you know and understand that the materials presented at and/or downloadable from the Website include explicit visual, audio, and/or textual depictions of nudity and explicit sexual activities.

If you are using the Services on behalf of a company, business or other entity, or if you are using the Services for commercial purposes, you and the entity will hold harmless and indemnify the Oath Entities (defined in Section 8 below) from any suit, claim or action arising from or related to the use of the Services or violation of these Terms, including any liability or expense arising from claims (including claims for negligence), losses, damages, suits, judgments, litigation costs and attorneys’ fees.
If you want to opt out of this, enable the Do Not Track setting in your browser then we won’t count you.
